name: Unstable Build in Cyber City
description:
DEAR LANDLORDS,

Earn Cybercurrency by dropping HOUSING UNITS.

Watch out though, the HOUSING UNITS aren't built to last.

Reach the target height and maybe the air will be breathable.

Gameplay:

- Left click on the provided blocks to buy them (provided you have the money)

- Left click on the middle area to drop the tile you bought

- Left click on tiles to repair them for a cost, or they will degrade to the point of crumbling away

- Scroll to see all of your building

Credits: Art done by Bea!

Music done by Hugelogan https://soundcloud.com/krugbit

Code done by WetBurritoSupreme!
